name: MyUser Payments
author: MyUser LLC

sections.description:
WooCommerce – The most user friendly e-commerce toolkit that helps you sell anything. Beautifully.
MyUser Payments Money – Integrate it in 29 seconds. Easiest Payment Gateway system.

Visit myuser.com for more info about this plugin.

Configuration

  1. Visit the WooCommerce > Settings > Checkout tab.
  2. Click on MyUser Payments to edit the settings. If you do not see MyUser Payments in the list at the top of the screen make sure you have activated the plugin in the WordPress Plugin Manager.
  3. Enable the Payment Method, name it Credit Card / Debit Card / Internet Banking (this will show up on the payment page your customer sees).
  4. Add your API Keys (public live, private live, public test, private test keys).
  5. Define How much {Your store currency} is one dollar. It is extremely important because MyUser payments will use this number to convert your currency to dollar and charge users.
  6. Select Redirect url (URL you want MyUser Payments to redirect after payment).
  7. Click Save.
sections.installation:
1. Ensure you have latest version of WooCommerce plugin installed (WooCommerce 2.0+)
  2. Unzip and upload contents of the plugin to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. set API keys and configure settings (See Configuration)

short_description: MyUser is payment gateway that supports high risk businesses.
